id: Monogatari Series Second Season Original Soundtracks
Description:
Monogatari Series Second Season Original Soundtracks ( 〈物語〉シリーズ　セカンドシーズン Original Soundtracks ) is a compilation album containing all background music from Monogatari Series Second Season to Hanamonogatari.
The album is a special edition alongside with the Nisemonogatari & Nekomonogatari Black Original Soundtracks released on July 26, 2017.[1][2] Songs listed here are composed by Satoru Kosaki and Kei Haneoka.
